channel.title: 'Single' Username
channel.description:
I need help. I need to know how to make my server only joinable through one username. So if I wanted a certain username and people could log on as it, I would use.
[code]Username: Admin Password: Admin[/code]

item.title: 'Single' Username
item.dc:creator: @codeusa codeusa
item.description:
@codeusa wrote:

[quote=“Ckstunnerscape, post:6, topic:224683”][quote author=codeusa link=topic=295231.msg2373647#msg2373647 date=1218328676]

I need help. I need to know how to make my server only joinable through one username. So if I wanted a certain username and people could log on as it, I would use.

Username: Admin Password: Admin

Like a intergration between a server and a website like sign up on site login server?
[/quote]

I have no clue what you just said :|[/quote]

Because im a sexy mudkip

[quote=“mrX, post:7, topic:224683”]No, say I release my source. I want it to be limited and I tell people on my source thread that you must sign into the server (offline) as Admin, Admin. So they use runserver and login as Admin admin but cant use another username.

Is it

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Admin") == true) { sendMessage("Welcome to the server"); } else { if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Admin") == false) { disconnected = true;[/quote]

Im like really tired but uhh i think what your saying is you want to make it so they can only make one user?

Read full topic

item.description:
@Frell wrote:

if (playerName.startsWith(“Admin”)) {
// allow on
} else {
disconnected = true;
}
